quote: Do not save what is left after spending; instead spend what is left after saving.

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

quote: The more you learn, the more you earn.

quote: People buy into the leader before they buy into the vision.

quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.

quote: You can make more friends in two months by being interested in others than in two years trying to get people interested in you.

quote: Lost time is never found again.

quote: Persistence can change failure into extraordinary achievement.
author: Matt Biondi

quote: Success is not built on success. It’s built on failure, frustration, and sometimes even catastrophe.
author: Sumner Redstone

quote: A bend in the road is not the end of the road… unless you fail to make the turn.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.
author: Unknown

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Don’t count the hours, make the hours count.
author: Unknown

quote: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence, intelligent planning, and focused effort.
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: Plan your work and work your plan.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The richest people in the world look for and build networks. Everyone else looks for work.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: You can have everything in life you want, if you will just help other people get what they want.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn’t said.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Before you marry a person, you should first make them use a computer with slow internet to see who they really are.
author: Will Ferrell

quote: Age is something that doesn’t matter, unless you are a cheese.
author: Billie Burke

quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: Success isn’t always about greatness. It’s about consistency. Consistent hard work leads to success.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: The dream is free. The hustle is sold separately.
author: Unknown

quote: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don’t recognize them.
author: Ann Landers

quote: Financial fitness is not a pipe dream or a state of mind—it’s a reality if you are willing to pursue it and embrace it.
author: Will Robinson

quote: Richness is not about what you have, but what you can do without.
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: The task of the leader is to get their people from where they are to where they have not been.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: The growth and development of people is the highest calling of leadership.
author: Harvey S. Firestone

quote: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Don’t wait for the perfect moment. Take the moment and make it perfect.
author: Zoey Sayward

quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: A strong positive mental attitude will create more miracles than any wonder drug.
author: Patricia Neal

quote: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: You can make more friends in two months by becoming interested in other people than in two years by trying to get people interested in you.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Excellence is not a skill, it’s an attitude.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
author: Unknown

quote: Discipline is remembering what you want.
author: David Campbell

quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Your future is created by what you do today, not tomorrow.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated daily.
author: Robert Collier

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Small steps every day lead to big results.
author: Unknown

quote: You can’t build a reputation on what you are going to do.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Motivation gets you started; habit keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh

quote: Work until you no longer have to introduce yourself.
author: Unknown

quote: Do what you love, and you’ll never work a day in your life.
author: Confucius

quote: It’s not about ideas. It’s about making ideas happen.
author: Scott Belsky

quote: Hard work without talent is a shame, but talent without hard work is a tragedy.
author: Robert Half

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Not everything that can be counted counts, and not everything that counts can be counted.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: It’s not about having a lot of money. It’s knowing how to use it wisely.
author: Suze Orman

quote: Don’t tell me where your priorities are. Show me where you spend your money and I’ll tell you what they are.
author: James W. Frick

quote: Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
author: Henry David Thoreau
